solution_line_template: He spends {vacuuming_hours}*{times_longer_other_chores}=<<{vacuuming_hours}*{times_longer_other_chores}={other_chores_hours}>>{other_chores_hours} hours on his other chores
So he spends {vacuuming_hours}+{other_chores_hours}=<<{vacuuming_hours}+{other_chores_hours}={total_hours}>>{total_hours} hours on chores
